title: Only me who find this insane?
body:
Look at these two pictures...

[Here!](https://goo.gl/photos/gkv5F1YnXrNWRJ6D9)

Now is it only me who think it BS that i didnt get "S"?

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
you had 487 wins and 487 losses. thats why.

in seriousness you have 200 cs in a 50 min game.

i know what youre thinking though, maybe you got less cs cuz you wanted to roam, get kills, and win the game by pushing waves hard (and missing cs). a s rank, however, has to do with performance, but winning has nothing to do (necessarily) with performance. be more selfish if you want an s in all honesty OR be like me and not care about the grading system and use it as a guide to whether you individually did ok

Played an game after that, support and built almost full Ap, ended up (and fking adc stats) carring and got S+...
This system is awsome

How ever that adc said that it liked that game XD

Also i didnt take any turrets and i think thats why i didnt get s- or s
But honestly that i didnt get s or s- was not the problem rly... It was that ekko got and he sucked XD

It is some type of average system from what I can gather.

They currently include aram...
Where that is a low score for zil.
i think aram is separate as that gamemode changes a lot of the average stats
Not sure on that considering CS still plays huge role in ARAM rating.
CS counts, so 200 in a 50 minute game knocks you down a few marks. An S typically requires excellence in all categories. That is a really strong performance though!
